site.description: Video analysis and training management platform for football.

homePage.description: Turn your YouTube or Vimeo videos into real training sessions. Our artificial intelligence detects themes, age categories, and generates detailed synopses for your players.

about.title: üëã About
about.intro: <0>Yanni</0>, cybersecurity student, majoring in <1>Networks & Telecommunications in B√©thune</1>. I created Kdufoot to help football coaches <2>save time</2>.

video.title: üé¨ AI Video Analysis
video.description: Paste a video link and our AI generates detailed exercises with synopsis, themes, and age categories.

match.title: ‚öΩ Friendly Matches
match.description: Post or search for friendly matches. Filter by category, level, distance, and format.

video.urlPlaceholder: Paste your YouTube, TikTok, Insta video link, etc.
video.analyzeSubtitle: Paste your YouTube video link to get a detailed analysis of your exercises.

exercises.emptySubtitle: Analyze a video to generate your first exercises!

training.description: Select exercises from the library to build your training session.
training.hero_create: Create your custom training session by adding exercises from the library.

favorites.title: My Favorites
favorites.description_exercises: Find here all the exercises you have saved as favorites for one-click access.
favorites.description_matches: Check out the friendly matches that caught your eye and keep an eye on opportunities.
favorites.empty_exercises_desc: Add exercises to your favorites to find them here.
favorites.empty_matches_desc: Your liked matches will appear here.

filters.explanation: No filter is mandatory. For example, you can leave the city blank to see matches in the entire region, or specify your criteria (category, level...) to refine your search according to your needs.

sessions.title: Training / Match Summary
sessions.description_sessions: Organize and plan your training sessions to best prepare your players.
sessions.description_matches: Track your scheduled friendly matches and keep control of your sports calendar.

permissions.featureRequiresUpgrade: This feature requires a higher subscription plan.
permissions.upgrade: Upgrade to {{plan}} to unlock this feature

matchesPage.description_find: Browse available friendly matches near you. Use filters to refine your search and find the perfect opponent.
matchesPage.description_create: Post your friendly match announcement by filling in as many details as possible to attract the right clubs.
matchesPage.empty_desc: Try modifying your filters or create a new friendly match.

link_club.title: Link your club (Irreversible Action)
link_club.warning_siret: Warning: The SIRET number can only be entered once.
link_club.warning_auto: Upon validation, the address, zip code, and city will be automatically filled.
link_club.warning_final: The club will be permanently associated with your account.
link_club.support: In case of subsequent club change, contact support with proof.

alerts.siret_length: The SIRET must contain exactly 14 digits.
